title: You're Still the One
lyrics:
[Intro]
(C) (C) (F) (G) x2 

[Verse 1]
(C)Looks like we made it, (F)look how far we've (G)come my baby
(C)We mighta took the long way, (F)we knew we'd (G)get there someday

[Bridge]
(C)They said, "I bet (F)they'll never (G)make it"
But just (C)look at us (F)holding (G)on
We're still (C)together still (F)going (G)strong(F)

[Chorus]
You're still the (C)one
You're still the one I (F)run to
(Dm)The one that I be(G)long to
(C)You're still the (F)one I want for (G)life(F)
You're still the (C)one
You're still the one that (F)I love
(Dm)The only one I (G)dream of
(C)You're still the one I (F)kiss good (G)night

[Verse 2]
(C)Ain't nothin' better
(F)We beat the (G)odds together
(C)I'm glad we didn't listen
(F)Look at what we (G)would be missin'

[Bridge]
(C)They said, "I bet (F)they'll never (G)make it"
But just (C)look at us (F)holding (G)on
We're still (C)together still (F)going (G)strong(F)

[Chorus]
You're still the (C)one
You're still the one I (F)run to
(Dm)The one that I be(G)long to
(C) You're still the (F)one I want for (G)life(F)
You're still the (C)one
You're still the one that (F)I love
(Dm)The only one I (G)dream of
(C)You're still the one I (F)kiss good (G)night

(C)(C)(F)(G)x2

[Chorus]
You're still the (C)one
You're still the one I (F)run to
(Dm)The one that I be(G)long to
(C)You're still the (F)one I want for (G)life(F)
You're still the (C)one
You're still the one that (F)I love
(Dm)The only one I (G)dream of
(C)You're still the one I (F)kiss good (G)night

[Outro]
(C)So glad we made it, (F)look how far we've (G)come my baby
(C tremeloooooo) [END]
